Nerangs.ab: taštag kē-š zōhr padiš abar ǰām gāh nihišn ahurəm mazdąm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide abar sar ī barsom nihišn aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā huxšaϑrā huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide pad hōy ī barsom nihišn apō at̰ yazamaide zōhr abar āb nihišn

"He has to put the cup that contains the zōhr on the place of the ǰīwām. At ahurəm mazdąm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide, he has to put it on the end of the barsom. At aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā huxšaϑrā huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide, he has to put it on the left side of the barsom. At apō at̰ yazamaide, he has to put the zōhr on the water."
taštag kē-š zōhr padiš abar ǰām nihišn ahurəm mazdąm andar mayān māhrōy abar sar ī barsom aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā tā huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide pad hōy ī barsom apō at̰ yazamaide zōhr abar āb nihišn

"He has to put the cup that contains the zōhr on ǰīwām. At ahurəm mazdąm, he has to put it in the middle of māhrōy, at the end of the barsom. At aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā until huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide, on the left side of the barsom. At apō at̰ yazamaide, on the water."
